caption: In a room, several men and women are gathered around the body of an old man. They appear to be in deep sorrow as the old man has been murdered. The atmosphere in the room is filled with grief.Next, in a lavishly decorated house, a man and a woman are engaged in a conversation. They seem to be anxious about something and share a close bond, possibly as siblings.Then, inside a tent, one man enters, and another man is seated there, looking like a leader. These two men engage in a discussion, deliberating on some important matters.
